channel.title: Pure Phoenix (Pure fighters) guild wars and now counter strike clan!
channel.description: Btw this has been approuved by mopar if you dont believe you can ask mopar :P hey guys, just trying to get the counter strike part of the clan active ive spent 3 days working on the server making it just right. The server is 20 man and i think 33 tick :) It runs with hardly ANY lag ( it probs only lags up when i update it with new maps). Anyway This is the server forum www.purefighters.co.uk (yes i know it has ad's on it we need to find a host) and this is the servers IP 195.149.21.56:27015 I hope you will come onto the server and play cause of the hard work i have put into it :) Jhon p.s.If you are interested in joining the guild wars part of the clan Pm psyco thunder or moocow is the best
